start.greetingMessage: Hello from Geo Collector Bot! Start collecting data with the /collect command

help.content: The help section is work in progress...

events.interactionCompleted: You have completed the data gathering! Thank you

errors.chatIdNotFound: Sorry, I couldn't recognize this chat
errors.retrieveInteraction: We are experiencing problems retrieving your data. Please, try again later
errors.createInteraction: We are experiencing problems persisting you data. Please, try again later
errors.updateInteraction: We are experiencing problems saving your answer. Please, try again later
errors.noInteractionsFound: It seems you don't have any ongoing interaction. Start one with the /collect command
errors.tooManyInteractionsFound: It seems you have multiple ongoing interactions. TODO
errors.unknownStep: Sorry, I couldn't determine the state of your interaction
errors.wrongStepType: The answer you have provided is not suitable for the question. Please, try again
